verses.text: \w Then|strong="H3478"\w* some \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w these|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* wicked \w stumbling|strong="H4383"\w* \w blocks|strong="H4383"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*. Should \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w consult|strong="H1875"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* \w way|strong="H6440"\w*?

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w When|strong="H1696"\w* \w any|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w sets|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w puts|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wicked \w stumbling|strong="H4383"\w* \w block|strong="H4383"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w then|strong="H6030"\w* \w comes|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* according \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w great|strong="H7230"\w* idolatry,

\w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w take|strong="H8610"\w* \w hold|strong="H8610"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w estranged|strong="H2114"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*.’

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Repent|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*; \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w or|strong="H1004"\w* \w any|strong="H6440"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1616"\w* dwelling \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w separates|strong="H5144"\w* \w himself|strong="H3820"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w sets|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w puts|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wicked \w stumbling|strong="H4383"\w* \w block|strong="H4383"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w then|strong="H6030"\w* \w comes|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w Myself|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w enticed|strong="H6601"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w*, \w then|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w enticed|strong="H6601"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5375"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w*—\w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H5030"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w inquirer|strong="H1875"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* same \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H5030"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*—

\w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w order|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w stray|strong="H8582"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Me|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* themselves \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3069"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.’” Four Dire Judgments

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w sins|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H7971"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w acting|strong="H4603"\w* \w unfaithfully|strong="H4604"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w supply|strong="H4294"\w* \f + \fr 14:13 \ft Hebrew staff\f* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w both|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* beast,

\w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w even|strong="H1840"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H1992"\w*—\w Noah|strong="H5146"\w*, \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, \w and|strong="H6666"\w* Job—\w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w*, \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w could|strong="H5337"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w only|strong="H5337"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Or|strong="H2416"\w* \w if|strong="H3863"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w send|strong="H5674"\w* \w wild|strong="H7451"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* leave \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w childless|strong="H7921"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w man|strong="H7451"\w* \w passing|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w*,

\w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w surely|strong="H5337"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, even \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w could|strong="H5337"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* alone would \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land would \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*.

\w Or|strong="H4480"\w* \w if|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w bring|strong="H5674"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* land \w and|strong="H2719"\w* say, ‘Let \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*,’ \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w both|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H5674"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* beast,

\w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w could|strong="H5337"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* own \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* alone would \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w*.

\w Or|strong="H4480"\w* \w if|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w plague|strong="H1698"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* land \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w bloodshed|strong="H1818"\w*, cutting \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w both|strong="H4480"\w* man \w and|strong="H7971"\w* beast,

\w then|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w surely|strong="H5337"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w even|strong="H1840"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w*, \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Job \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w could|strong="H5337"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. \w Their|strong="H1992"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w could|strong="H5337"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w only|strong="H5337"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w*.
